name: kwikiSpace
overview:
Connect your digital life with kwikiSpace.

If you are like most people, you use a number of internet services to communicate with friends via email or chat, research for work or play, share messages and be social. You also use applications on your PC for work and play. Though its great to have access to so many useful applications, unfortunately you end up with important information in multiple places.

kwikiSpace allows you to bring together information important to you together in one place. Any web page from the internet, from your PC, from Twitter, Search, Facebook and soon to come from Google Docs, Google Chat and Dropbox.

Once in kwikiSpace you can connect one piece of information with another piece of information to keep relevant information from various sources connected and available together. You can also comment and rate any information from any of the source.

Feel free to share messages with a friend or a private group. You can also share any collected information or information that is connected with other information.

kwikiSpace allows you to keep using the various internet services you love to use but want to connect the pieces for yourself or keep your private group updated and on the same page.
